Thirdparty code should be checked in here.
All data in here belongs to its respective owner.
You must ensure not to violate any of their rights. It is your responsibility to find out the specific usage agreements for each product.
If you redistribute the content of this repository, you must either ensure that you are allowed to redistribute that data or refrain from doing so.


Please do not commit arbitrary libraries here. Only add code that is really required for the engine code.
If you need a third party library for a personal project, which you have not checked in here, please manage those libraries yourself elsewhere.
